document.full_text: los angeles lakers center andrew bynum has been suspended for the first five games of next season for his flagrant foul on dallas mavericks guard j.j. barea, the nba said on tuesday.
document.title: lakers' bynum suspended five games for flagrant foul
lines_and_colors: los angeles lakers center andrew bynum has been suspended for the first five games of next season for his flagrant foul on dallas mavericks guard j.j. barea, the nba said on tuesday.
